RMU_MRF.settings.enableOverlay.name: Enable Movement Overlay
RMU_MRF.settings.enableOverlay.hint: Toggle the visual overlay on/off. Can also be toggled via hotkey (Default: 'M').
RMU_MRF.settings.GridlessResolution.name: Gridless Resolution (Pixels)
RMU_MRF.settings.GridlessResolution.hint: Controls the size of the invisible grid on Gridless maps. Lower values create a smoother, more accurate shape but require significantly more PC power. Default is 20.
RMU_MRF.settings.movementRounding.name: Grid Movement Rounding Rule
RMU_MRF.settings.movementRounding.hint: Determines if a unit can enter a square if they lack the full movement cost.
RMU_MRF.settings.movementRounding.choice: Permissive: Enter if ANY movement remains (> 0)
Standard: Enter if > 50% of grid cost remains
Strict: Enter only if FULL grid cost remains (100%)
RMU_MRF.settings.overlayOpacity.name: Overlay Opacity
RMU_MRF.settings.overlayOpacity.hint: Transparency of the movement grid (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = solid).
RMU_MRF.keybindings.toggleOverlay.name: Toggle Movement Overlay
RMU_MRF.keybindings.toggleOverlay.hint: Shows or hides the RMU movement range finder.
RMU_MRF.keybindings.resetAnchor.name: Reset Movement Anchor
RMU_MRF.keybindings.resetAnchor.hint: Resets the starting 'Anchor' point to the token's current position. Use this when starting a new turn or movement segment.
